issue.title: [CI][Debian] rsync is missing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14984](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14984). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4415960154?check_suite_focus=true

```

+ mkdir -p /build/docs/c_glib
+ rsync -a /usr/local/share/gtk-doc/html/ /build/docs/c_glib
/arrow/ci/scripts/c_glib_build.sh: line 52: rsync: command not found
127
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14984?focusedCommentId=17453528) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11859
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11859>
